description: Jimmy Bullet"The Bulldozer"Ht: 6'3" WT: 195lbs Season W/L record (0-0)Billy Santoro"The Bodyslam"Ht: 6'0" WT: 190lbsSeason W/L record (1-0) Two muscled studs step onto the NK mat this week fighting for the right to fuck. Newcomer Jimmy "The Bulldozer" Bullet comes to NK with five years of military combative training, combined with his large size he thinks he'll have no problem winning this match. His opponent is returning fighter Billy "Bodyslam" Santoro. After winning his first match against Jesse "Cut-Throat" Colter, Bodyslam's confident that his oversized opponent won't be able to escape his vicious cradle. These two studs oil themselves down in the third round with raging hard cocks as they fight with all their might to ensure victory. Only one can come out on top though, while the loser has his ass beaten red before he's left tied up and covered in cum.
title: Billy "Bodyslam" Santoro vs Jimmy "The Bulldozer" Bullet - OIL MATCH!
